title: Pray (feat. Kameron Alexander)
lyrics:
Lay my soul out bear by the river, mmm
Let my bridges burn and deliver me, mmm
Bring my soul back from the rhythm
Of the chains that got me here
It ain't fair, no, it ain't, mmm

Mercy, mercy, mercy

I've no luck with the man upstairs

Help me, help me, help me



Won't you pray?

'Cause she don't hear me like she hears you pray

So just pray for me

Won't you pray?

'Cause I'm too far from heaven when i pray

So just pray for me



Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah

Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah

Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah

Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah



Mercy, mercy, mercy

Help me, help me, help me

Mercy, mercy, mercy

Help me, help me, help me

Mercy, mercy, mercy

Help me, help me, help me

Mercy, mercy, mercy

Help me, help me, help me

Help me, help me

Help me, help me

Help me, help me



Won't you pray?

'Cause she don't hear me like she hears you pray

So just pray for me

Won't you pray?

'Cause I'm too far from heaven when i pray

So just pray for me



Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah

Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah

Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah

Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah
